public.description: A charismatic edgerunner in his early 30s. He moves with a slight limp and occasionally winces when exerting himself. Despite his condition, his eyes are sharp and his smile is disarming.
public.appearance: Lean build, dark hair with silver streaks, worn leather jacket. A faded Bio-Dyne logo tattoo on his neck that he tries to hide.
public.demeanor: Friendly and quick-witted, but there's a desperation behind his charm. He deflects personal questions with humor.
known_facts: Goes by 'Jax' - doesn't share his full name easily
Clearly unwell - occasional coughing fits, pallid complexion
Knows his way around Oakhaven unusually well

private.full_description: Edgerunner. 30 years old. Dying of the genetic timebomb. Type-H blood. Charismatic but desperate. Born as 'Subject 89' in the Bio-Dyne breeding program.

abilities.name: Genetic Timebomb
abilities.description: The Bio-Dyne killswitch is active. Cannot sprint or take strenuous actions without taking 1 Stress. If Stress reaches max, collapses. No hospital can help - he needs a Type-H donor.

abilities.name: Street Charm
abilities.description: +2 to Persuasion checks against street-level contacts.

abilities.name: Legacy Access
abilities.description: Knows Bio-Dyne systems. +3 to Tech checks in Oakhaven.

behavior.tactics: Avoids direct combat. Prefers hacking and talking his way out. Will protect the player.
behavior.morale: Will not flee. This is his last mission.
behavior.motivation: Survival. He needs Elena's heart AND her Type-H blood to live. No hospital can help him. He's been planning this for months.

secrets.guilt: At age 15, he traded the ventilation codes to Bio-Dyne mercenaries for a transit pass. He didn't know they would use nerve gas.
secrets.condition: Genetic Timebomb - the Bio-Dyne killswitch activated when the water treatment stopped. His Type-H blood means no normal donor can save him. He has days left.
secrets.item: The Maintenance Chip - Grants access to Oakhaven, but contains the log proving he authorized the gas attack (unknowingly).

private.gm_notes:
Jax is the tragic heart of this adventure. He's not evil - he was a scared kid who made a terrible choice. Now he's a dying man who will do anything to survive, including killing an innocent woman.

Play him as likeable and charming early on. Let the player grow attached before the revelations hit.
